mapper.sql: id, name, province_id, county_id, city_id, town_id, village_id, community_id, password, member_id, is_open, remaining_storage_size, storage_size, create_time
mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, c.province_id, c.county_id, c.city_id, c.town_id, c.village_id, c.community_id, c.password, c.member_id, c.is_open, c.remaining_storage_size, c.storage_size, c.create_time ,m.file_address from cemetery c LEFT JOIN goods_use_relat gur on (c.id = gur.object_id and gur.type=1) LEFT JOIN goods_official go on (gur.goods_id = go.id) left JOIN model m on (go.extend_attribute = m.id) where c.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by c.id
mapper.insert:
insert into cemetery
id,
name,
province_id,
county_id,
city_id,
town_id,
village_id,
community_id,
password,
member_id,
is_open,
remaining_storage_size,
storage_size,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{townId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{villageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remainingStorageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{storageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update cemetery
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
town_id = #{townId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
village_id = #{villageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remaining_storage_size = #{remainingStorageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
storage_size = #{storageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from cemetery where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(1) from cemetery where community_id = #{community_id} and id <= #{id} order by create_time asc

select c.id, c.name, c.province_id, c.county_id, c.city_id, c.town_id, c.village_id, c.community_id, c.password, c.member_id, c.is_open, c.remaining_storage_size, c.storage_size, c.create_time ,m.file_address from cemetery c LEFT JOIN goods_use_relat gur on (c.id = gur.object_id and gur.type=1) LEFT JOIN goods_official go on (gur.goods_id = go.id) left JOIN model m on (go.extend_attribute = m.id) where c.member_id = ${member_id} group by c.id order by c.create_time asc

select c.id, c.name, c.province_id, c.county_id, c.city_id, c.town_id, c.village_id, c.community_id, c.password, c.member_id, c.is_open, c.remaining_storage_size, c.storage_size, c.create_time ,m.file_address modelAddress from cemetery c LEFT JOIN goods_use_relat gur on (c.id = gur.object_id and gur.type=1) LEFT JOIN goods_official go on (gur.goods_id = go.id) left JOIN model m on (go.extend_attribute = m.id) where c.member_id = ${member_id} group by c.id order by c.create_time asc limit ${page.pageNo}, ${page.pageSize}

select id, member_id from cemetery where id IN
#{item}
